data.title: Arts and entertainment events happening August 8th-11th across the Mid-Ohio Valley
data.meta_description: Joe Oliverio joins Daybreak to discuss what’s happening August 8th-11th across the Mid-Ohio Valley!
data.text:
PARKERSBURG, W.Va. (WTAP) - Here is a look at all the arts and entertainment events happening this weekend across the Mid-Ohio Valley. A complete list of events can be found at artsbridgeonline.org

Thursday, August 8th

Wes Banco Artist Display- Christine Rhodes 9:00am - 3:00pm @ WesBanco- Market St Parkersburg WV

Camp Creativity- ages 4 and entering Kindergarten 10:00am - 12:00pm @ Parkersburg Art Center

Camp Creativity- Teen Clay Camp 1:00pm - 4:00pm @ Parkersburg Art Center

Book Tasting- ages 18+ 2:00pm - 4:00pm @ New Matamoras Library

Children’s Movie Night- ages 5-12 4:00pm - 5:30pm @ Marietta Public Library- 5th St Marietta OH

Youth Summer Rowing Camp 4:30pm - 6:30pm @ Harmar Rowing Club Gilman Ave Marietta OH

Friends of the Library- teens to adults 5:00pm - 6:00pm @ Wash Co Library- Beverly Branch

Open Sew/ Learn to Sew- ages 16+ 5:30pm - 7:30pm @ BB2C Makerspace

Artsbridge Summer Music Series 6:30pm - 8:00pm @ Parkersburg City Park

Marietta Music in the Park 7:00pm - 8:00pm

Friday, August 9th

Wes Banco Artist Display- Christine Rhodes 9:00am - 3:00pm @ WesBanco- Market St Parkersburg, WV

Camp Creativity- ages 4 and entering Kindergarten 10:00am - 12:00pm @ Parkersburg Art Center

Kindergarten Gear Up 10:00am - 11:00am @ Belpre Public Library

Toddler Time- ages 18 months- 3 years 10:00am - 11:00am @ Marietta Public Library- 5th St Marietta, OH

Muskingum Lock Tours 1:30pm - 4:30pm @ Valley Gem Sternwheeler

Gaming Hour- ages 8-18 4:00pm - 5:30pm @ Barlow Branch Library

Youth Summer Rowing Camp 4:30pm - 6:30pm @ Harmar Rowing Club Gilman Ave Marietta, OH

Imagining Democracy Opening Reception/ Betsy Cook 5:00pm - 7:00pm @ Parkersburg Art Center

Sugar and Spice Book Club- ages 18+ 5:00pm - 6:00pm @ Belpre Public Library

Threads- Opening Reception/ Doug Kreinik 5:00pm - 7:00pm @ Parkersburg Art Center

Transitory States: photography by Ardine Nelson- opening reception 5:30pm - 7:30pm @ Parkersburg Art Center

Jazz on the River 6:00pm - 8:00pm @ Valley Gem Sternwheeler

Marietta Cross Country and Friends 5K Run/ Walk 6:30pm @ Muskingum Park

The Creepy Creeps of Pilgrim Road/ Jr. Players 7:30pm @ Mid-Ohio Valley Players Theater Marietta, OH

Firehouse LIVE 8:00pm @ Peoples Bank Theatre

Point Park Concert on the River- Right Now- Tribute to Van Halen 8:00pm - 9:30pm @ Point Park

RTA MTB Night Ride 8:00pm - 9:30pm @ 100 Mill Creek Rd Marietta, OH

RTA Glow Paddle 9:00pm - 11:00pm @ Indian Acres Park Marietta, OH

Saturday, August 10th

Lowell Lock Cruise 9:00am - 5:00pm @ Valley Gem Sternwheeler

Around Town Historic Bike Tour 10:00am - 11:00am @ Marietta Adventure Company

Cemetery Tour: The Multiracial History @ Mound Cemetery 10:00am - 11:00am @ Mound Cemetery’s Fifth Street gate

Group Road Rides 10:00am - 12:00pm @ Marietta Adventure Company

Imagining Democracy/ Betsy Cook 10:00am - 5:00pm @ Parkersburg Art Center

Threads/ Doug Kreinik exhibit 10:00am - 5:00pm @ Parkersburg Art Center

Transitory States: Photography by Ardine Nelson 10:00am - 5:00pm @ Parkersburg Art Center

Walshapalooza 7 11:00am - 11:45pm @ Over the Moon Pub and Pizza

Cemetery Tour: The Multiracial History @ Mound Cemetery 12:00pm - 1:00pm @ Mound Cemetery’s Fifth Street gate

Kids Fest 12:00pm - 3:00pm @ Buell Island- Lowell, OH

Family Fun Ride 2:00pm - 2:45pm @ Marietta Adventure Company

Family Movie Night: Wonka 6:00pm - 10:00pm @ Parkersburg City Park

14th Annual Tortoise and Hare World Championship 7:30pm - 8:00pm @ Marietta Adventure Company

The Creepy Creeps of Pilgrim Road/ Jr. Players 7:30pm @ Mid-Ohio Valley Players Theater Marietta OH

The Glorious Sons 9:00pm @ Adelphia Music Hall

Sunday, August 11th

Sunday Funday- Breakfast and Lunch 7:00am - 2:00pm @ Lafayette Hotel

Marietta City Trail Run 8:30am - 9:30am @ Marietta Adventure Company

Appalachian Understories Presents: Beginners Botany by Bike 10:00am - 11:00am @ Marietta Adventure Company

Mighty Muskingum River Raft Race! 1:00pm @ Indian Acres Park Marietta OH

Gnome Adventure Hike 2:00pm - 3:00pm @ Kroger Wetlands- Kroger in Marietta

Sensory Friendly Film: CARS 3 2:00pm @ Peoples Bank Theatre

The Creepy Creeps of Pilgrim Road/ Jr. Players 3:00pm @ Mid-Ohio Valley Players Theater Marietta OH
